name: metapatcher
description: HTML document head management including meta tags, social media tags, icons and JSONLD expressions across devices.

scripts.test: for i in tests/*.js; do node "$i"; done
scripts.build: npm run build-minified && npm run build-umd && npm run build-umd-polyfilled
scripts.build-umd-polyfilled: mkdir -p dist/umd-polyfilled && mkdir -p ./source-compiled && BABEL_ENV=production ./node_modules/.bin/babel ./source -d ./source-compiled && ./node_modules/.bin/browserify -s Metapatcher ./source-compiled/index.js -o ./dist/umd-polyfilled/index.js && ./node_modules/.bin/minify ./dist/umd-polyfilled/index.js --out-file ./dist/umd-polyfilled/index.js && rm -rf ./source-compiled

author: Murat GÃ¶zel <murat@gozel.com.tr>
